survey_brief: This survey aims to identify key barriers and motivators influencing consumer decisions regarding electric vehicle (EV) adoption to inform marketing and policy strategies.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?

questions.question_text: What are the TOP 3 factors preventing you from purchasing an EV? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 response is 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'
questions.client_notes: Multi-select with max 3 choices. Include 'Other' with open-text follow-up.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice (checkboxes) with validation for â‰¤3 selections

script.question_text: What are the TOP 3 factors preventing you from purchasing an EV? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 response is 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely'

questions.question_text: What would most effectively encourage you to purchase an EV?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with 'Other' option. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice (radio buttons) with option randomization

script.question_text: What would most effectively encourage you to purchase an EV?

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with current EV tax incentives or rebates in your area?
questions.client_notes: 4-point scale avoids neutral midpoint. Include tooltip with local incentive examples.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with hover-over information icon

script.question_text: How familiar are you with current EV tax incentives or rebates in your area?

questions.question_text: What is your estimated daily driving distance (round trip)?
questions.client_notes: Use mileage bands relevant to EV range capabilities. Include 'Prefer not to say' if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with 'Prefer not to say' opt-out

script.question_text: What is your estimated daily driving distance (round trip)?

questions.question_text: Do you have access to at-home charging (e.g., garage, driveway)?
questions.client_notes: Critical for infrastructure analysis. Include visual aid showing charging scenarios.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with accompanying illustration

script.question_text: Do you have access to at-home charging (e.g., garage, driveway)?

questions.question_text: How concerned are you about the environmental impact of your current vehicle?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale measures environmental motivation. Anchor with 'Not applicable' if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with 'Not applicable' option

script.question_text: How concerned are you about the environmental impact of your current vehicle?

questions.question_text: Which EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select brand awareness question. Include major and emerging brands.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice (checkboxes) with 'Select all that apply' instruction

script.question_text: Which EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional information would help you make an informed decision about EV purchase?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unanticipated concerns. Limit to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character counter

script.question_text: What additional information would help you make an informed decision about EV purchase?

questions.question_text: Which of these statements best describes your attitude toward EV technology?
answer_options: I'm an early adopter who embraces new technology
I'll adopt once technology is proven and widely available
I prefer to wait until prices decrease significantly
I have strong reservations about EV technology
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with attitudinal segments. Randomize non-polar options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with option randomization (except first/last options)

script.question_text: Which of these statements best describes your attitude toward EV technology?
answer_options: I'm an early adopter who embraces new technology
I'll adopt once technology is proven and widely available
I prefer to wait until prices decrease significantly
I have strong reservations about EV technology
